doc.title: Bandwidth

value.content: Bandwidth is the measure of how much information can pass through a data connection in a given amount of time. It is usually measured in multiples of bits-per-second (bps), for example megabits-per-second (Mbps) or gigabits-per-second (Gbps).

value.title: See also
value.content: • Bandwidth on Wikipedia
